title: Statement by the President on Ash Wednesday | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 17, 2010

 



Statement by the President on Ash Wednesday




Michelle and I join Christians here in America and around the world in observing Ash Wednesday.Â  We mark this solemn day of repentance and promise, knowing that Lent is a time for millions to renew faith and also deepen a commitment to loving and serving one another.
